languages.text: "Вот так так. Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, смотрите, времени зря не тратит — сразу показывает пятнам на своей подошве, что к чему и где чье место!"

traits.locale_text: "Пф-ф! Скорее грязное пятно на их носовом платке".

languages.text: "Well, well! Our Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} is not one to mince words — {mf|he|she} up and tells the specks on the soles of {mf|his|her} shoes where they belong!"
languages.original_text: "Вот так так. Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, смотрите, времени зря не тратит — сразу показывает пятнам на своей подошве, что к чему и где чье место!"

traits.locale_text: "Well, well! Our Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} is not one to mince words — {mf|he|she} up and tells the specks on the soles of {mf|his|her} shoes where they belong!"

"Well, well! Our Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} is not one to mince words — {mf|he|she} up and tells the specks on the soles of {mf|his|her} shoes where they belong!"

languages.text: “哎呀！哎呀！我们这位来自上界的大人还真是心直口快！{mf|他|她}会站起身来，让{mf|他|她}鞋底上的泥巴点摆清它们的位置！”
languages.original_text: "Well, well! Our Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} is not one to mince words — {mf|he|she} up and tells the specks on the soles of {mf|his|her} shoes where they belong!"

traits.locale_text: “哎呀！哎呀！我们这位来自上界的大人还真是心直口快！{mf|他|她}会站起身来，让{mf|他|她}鞋底上的泥巴点摆清它们的位置！”

languages.text: 「ほうほう！我らが天の{mf|君|姫}は、言葉を選ぶようなお方ではない。靴の裏についた塵にすら、しかるべき場所を教えてやるとはね！」
languages.original_text: "Well, well! Our Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} is not one to mince words — {mf|he|she} up and tells the specks on the soles of {mf|his|her} shoes where they belong!"

traits.locale_text: 「ほうほう！我らが天の{mf|君|姫}は、言葉を選ぶようなお方ではない。靴の裏についた塵にすら、しかるべき場所を教えてやるとはね！」

languages.text: «¡Vaya, vaya! {mf|Nuestro Señor|Nuestra Señora} Celestial no tiene pelos en la lengua; ¡dice las cosas tal y como son, le pese a quien le pese!».
languages.original_text: "Well, well! Our Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} is not one to mince words — {mf|he|she} up and tells the specks on the soles of {mf|his|her} shoes where they belong!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Vaya, vaya! {mf|Nuestro Señor|Nuestra Señora} Celestial no tiene pelos en la lengua; ¡dice las cosas tal y como son, le pese a quien le pese!».

languages.text: "Aman! Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} lafını esirgemiyor, ayakkabısının tabanındaki lekeciklere yerlerini hatırlatıyor!"
languages.original_text: "Well, well! Our Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} is not one to mince words — {mf|he|she} up and tells the specks on the soles of {mf|his|her} shoes where they belong!"

traits.locale_text: "Aman! Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} lafını esirgemiyor, ayakkabısının tabanındaki lekeciklere yerlerini hatırlatıyor!"

languages.text: « Eh bien ! Notre Céleste Seigneurie va droit au but. {mf|Il|Elle} sait remettre à leur place les misérables vermisseaux ! »
languages.original_text: "Well, well! Our Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} is not one to mince words — {mf|he|she} up and tells the specks on the soles of {mf|his|her} shoes where they belong!"

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien ! Notre Céleste Seigneurie va droit au but. {mf|Il|Elle} sait remettre à leur place les misérables vermisseaux ! »

languages.text: "Sieh an, sieh an. {mf|Unser himmlischer Herr|Unsere himmlische Herrin} nimmt kein Blatt vor den Mund ... {mf|er|sie} sagt selbst dem Staub auf den Sohlen {mf|seiner|ihrer} Schuhe, wohin er gehört."
languages.original_text: "Well, well! Our Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} is not one to mince words — {mf|he|she} up and tells the specks on the soles of {mf|his|her} shoes where they belong!"

traits.locale_text: "Sieh an, sieh an. {mf|Unser himmlischer Herr|Unsere himmlische Herrin} nimmt kein Blatt vor den Mund ... {mf|er|sie} sagt selbst dem Staub auf den Sohlen {mf|seiner|ihrer} Schuhe, wohin er gehört."
